Posts.EditableText:
I haven't found help anywhere else, so I'm taking a shot in the dark here. Since the web version of Quest has been, let's say, less than sufficient for me, I've been trying to get the Windows application to run on my laptop through WineBottler. However, regardless of how I try to install the application, I get the same error, which goes something like "This application is not compatible with the version of Windows you are running."
Am I boned, or is there a way any of you have gotten Quest to run on OS X?
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

Unfortunately, the answer appears to be no.

Quest won't run in WINE on Linux, either. It is so dependent on Windows, you have to actually have Windows.
Posts.HTML:
